body.name: Kinderkraft Sofi Portable Travel Crib for Baby, Convertible Sleeping Cot 4 in 1 with Easy to Pack Playpen, Comfortable Bassinet Mattress and an Additional Cradle Function
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 35 mins
features: MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: a 4-in-1 baby bed for children from birth to 33lb. It acts as a Bassinet, travel cot, playard and cradle. It's lightweight and simple to fold, and the bag (included in the set) makes it easy to take SOFI on trips. The mattress (included in the set) can be set at two different heights

PRACTICAL: the travel bed has functional mesh sides thanks to which you can keep an eye on your child at all times. They ensure adequate air flow on hot days. Folding the cot takes just a few seconds, and its compact size makes transport a breeze

FUNCTIONAL: the portable bed comes with a comfortable mattress with a cover that can be easily removed and cleaned. The rocking frame can be locked and unlocked to the rocking function, and the fact that you don't need tools to change between functions and fold makes SOFI perfect for both trips and at home

STURDY: the steel frame makes sleeping cot stable and very durable. The upper rim is made of lightweight aluminum. The cover (top surface) of the mattress is made of cotton. The entire cover can be removed and machine washed (at 59 degrees)
STYLISH: the SOFI baby cot features a beautiful design. The classic gray is broken up by the bright wood tones, and the white mesh makes it look light and sleek

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EASY STORAGE SOFI is light and folds easily to the sizes of a small suitcase (W 24,80 in x L 38,18 in x H 5,51 in) - it will fit into a small boot. MATTRESS INCLUDED This baby crib is made of safe materials (steel, aluminium, cotton, polyester). SOFI baby bed comes with a matching-size mattress. ROCKING FUNCTION Does the little one need some gentle rocking? No problem - it's enough that you set the rocking frame in the right position, and SOFI will lull your baby to sleep.

This portable baby bed is light and folds flat, and thanks to the bag included in the set can be taken on a trip without a hustle. SOFI is a compact cot that can be easily folded into a size of a small suitcase (W 24,80 in x L 38,18 in x H 5,51 in), and thanks to the bag included in the set, it can be taken on travel – it can fit even in a tiny car boot. Folding takes only a few seconds and doesn’t require using tools.

The feature that distinguishes SOFI is the possibility of changing the rocking frame set-up. One move is enough to turn the SOFI from a baby bed into a cot with a rocking function as in a crib. Gentle rocking will soothe the baby and lull them to sleep. By setting the mattress on the lowest level, you can create a practical playpen, and thanks to mesh sides, you will be able to observe your child during their playtime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS VERSATILE CRIB
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a child for occasional use in a small apartment. It comes completely flat out of the box and it's very easy to snap the legs onto the frame, zip up the middle that holds the mattress and its ready to use.Folding it back down for travel/storage is easy peasy. The item is lightweight enough that it can be easily moved between rooms. The feature where the bottom of the legs turn so that the crib will sway a little is very nice.As far as the mattress itself is concerned, the mattress can be removed from the cover to be washed. I then took while it was out of the provided cover and put my own crib mattress sheet on it. When the cover had been washed and dried I placed the wood base only back inside that coverlet and dropped back into place and zipped around it. Then I laid the mattress with the new sheet on top of the zippered around wood base and it fits just as tight around the crib as it did within the provided mattress cover. In this way I am easily able to change the sheet when spit ups often happen. I'm not sure I could have gotten the mattress to go back inside that really tight cover with the wood base anyway. A VERY tight fit it is!I do LOVE everything about this smaller crib and cannot wait to see how well it continues to grow with the child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smelled moldy and was not very sturdy. Not great for active babies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, easy setup, small footprint, good for smaller spaces, not bulky
reviews.reviewText: I like that it was very easy to set up with no hassle at all, sturdy, good quality materials, perfect size for my four month old and can fit in way more spaces than my pack n play. It’s way easier to set up than the pack in play and looks much nicer.I didn’t like the case. It’s very flimsy and no padding or protection for traveling with it. The case is just a piece of synthetic material with straps and a zipper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Coming back to the US, we needed a crib for a month, and one we could use again every time we visit family.We loved how easy it is it set up and put away. Looks great, sturdy, and most importantly our baby slept.Thoughts... It's plastic, not wood. It's heavier than a pak n play, wish we had one at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mattress was already used, dirty and smelly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it except that you can put on a crib sheet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I really like it, quality is very good. I still haven’t figured how to clean the bed padding but other then that its really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how chic and well crafted it is. Nice that there’s an option to rock it and the mattress is perfect not to soft or hard ! The only this is that it doesn’t fold up smaller to pack and take it somewhere and it’s a little bit heavier to carry easily place to place
